nhstt 0.0.1
  • Reference

Package index

Setup package and download data

Download and manage NHS Talking Therapies data

nhstt_setup()
Setup R package and download NHS TT reports
nhstt_info()
Get information about NHS Talking Therapies datasets
nhstt_clear_download_cache()
Clear cached data

Available datasets

Tidy NHS Talking Therapy datasets available in this package

key_measures
Key measures dataset from NHS TT annual reports
medication_status
Medication status dataset from NHS TT annual reports
therapy_type
Therapy type dataset from NHS TT annual reports
effect_size
Effect size dataset from NHS TT annual reports

Functions for package developers

Download and explore raw data

nhstt_get_raw()
Download raw NHS TT data files as published on NHS Digital
nhstt_check_columns()
Check column names across years for a dataset
